mapper.insert: insert into t_driver (driver_id, province_id, city_id, region_id, version, is_deleted) values (#{driverId}, #{provinceId}, #{cityId}, #{regionId}, 0, 0)
insert into t_user (user_code, account, user_name, id_card, phone, password, role, version, is_deleted) values (#{driverId}, #{account}, #{driverName}, #{idCard}, #{phone}, #{password}, 2, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update t_driver set province_id=#{provinceId}, city_id = #{cityId}, region_id = #{regionId}, version = version +1 where driver_id=#{driverId} and version = #{version}
update t_user set user_name=#{driverName}, id_card=#{idCard}, phone=#{phone}, account = #{account}, password = #{password}, version = version +1 where user_code=#{driverId} and version = #{version}
mapper.select:
SELECT driver_id, user_name, phone, id_card, a.version version FROM t_driver a LEFT JOIN t_user b ON a.driver_id=b.user_code WHERE b.is_deleted=0
and driver_id like concat ('%',#{driverId},'%')
and user_name like concat ('%',#{driverName},'%')
and province_id like concat ('%',#{provinceId},'%')
and city_id like concat ('%',#{cityId},'%')
and region_id like concat ('%',#{regionId},'%')

SELECT driver_id, user_name driver_name, phone, id_card, account, b.`password`, province_id, city_id, region_id from t_driver a LEFT JOIN t_user b ON a.driver_id=b.user_code where driver_id=#{driverId}
